about_the_game:
Golem SMASH is currently in development

                                    Come follow our development in our discord!

In this game, you will embark on an epic quest as the last remaining golem, charged with the mission to restore peace to a poisoned land.

Play as a Golem with the ability to grow in size and strength, fighting a variety of enemies using physics based combat and interactive hand locomotion to traverse the world.

Throughout your journey, you will be introduced to an evolving array of gameplay mechanics and abilities, crucial for navigating diverse levels and confronting the ultimate adversary, "Calamity".

This immersive VR experience caters to all playstyles whether that's strategic and skillful play or mindless action packed fun.

  • Hand locomotion for intricate movement and fun parkour

  • Unique size manipulation abilities that effects both movement and combat

  • Stealth strategies for bypassing perilous zones

  • Sophisticated puzzle-solving to overcome challenges

In the ancient era, Niera, the revered Goddess of Peace, engaged in a fierce conflict against the God of Calamity, whose sole aim was to plunge the world into chaos and ruin. After a grueling battle, Niera managed to confine Calamity within a celestial citadel suspended in the heavens, sacrificing all of her strength to do so.

To safeguard the fragile balance of nature and maintain the seal imprisoning Calamity, with the last of her power, Niera bestowed life upon the Golems – formidable stone beings imbued with mystical abilities.

For generations, tranquility reigned as the Golems dutifully stood watch over the seal. However, the serenity was shattered when devout followers of Calamity, the Puklin Army, orchestrated a calculated assault on the floating fortress, seeking to unleash their malevolent deity. Exploiting the power of the Golems, they orchestrated the fortress's downfall, plunging the world into an era of darkness and despair.

With Calamity unleashed and darkness sweeping across the land, corruption spreads like a virulent plague, tainting all in its wake. As the lone surviving Golem, and with Niera's whereabouts unknown, you embark on an epic quest to vanquish Calamity and restore peace to the shattered world.

                                      A game brought to you by TwinRune Studio

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR. Standing or Room Scale

short_description: An action-packed / physics-based VR game where YOU are a GOLEM with the ability to grow in size and strength! Fight a variety of enemies using physics based combat and interactive hand locomotion to solve puzzles, defeat enemies and traverse the world.
